Initializer# init(coder:device:)

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.13+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init?(
    coder aDecoder: NSCoder,
    device: any MTLDevice
)
```
